## PortRedirection interface

A port redirection from a port on the host to a port in the virtual machine.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PortRedirection 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [hostAddress](./vm-providers.portredirection.hostaddress.md) | string | IP address or host name of the host machine. |
|  [hostPort](./vm-providers.portredirection.hostport.md) | number | Port number in the host machine. |
|  [vmPort](./vm-providers.portredirection.vmport.md) | number | Port number inside the virtual machine. |
